tweet: As the end of the month quickly approaches, rents come due. For federal employees, with no paycheck in sight, this is a scary time as they worry about paying bills and meeting basic obligations. They deserve better. #TrumpShutdown

The @UN sees the importance of addressing the rising global temperatures.  The United States must recommit to the global fight to mitigate the impact of #climatechange.

The @UNFCC is currently holding its annual #ClimateChange Conference in Poland. I believe the findings of the Fourth National Climate Assessment and know that together we can reduce greenhouse gas emissions and curb #climatechange.
#ClimateChange is a real threat to our public health and jeopardizes our future. Commitment to the #ParisAgreement is necessary.

Three years ago, 195 nations at the @UN signed the #ParisAgreement to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and protect our planet.  As Americans, we must recommit to mitigating the impact of #climatechange.
We must combat #climatechange to ensure a healthy, livable planet!
